content: Before I begin, I'd like to remind everyone that our third quarter 2022 results do not include the operations of Clearway Fiber, Hargray Managed IT or the Hargray Tallahassee operations, which we divested or contributed to new partnerships earlier this year and predominantly represent Business Services units and revenues. Capital expenditures totaled $100.5 million for the third quarter of 2022, which equates to 44.7% of adjusted EBITDA. Adjusted EBITDA less capital expenditures was $124.1 million for the third quarter of 2022, an increase of 24.6% from the prior year quarter.
